basis: The user description focuses on diaphragmatic breathing and micro-actions with no reported eating episode; action is aligned with BED management, not eating.
cognitive_dissonance: No explicit internal conflict detected; user consistently expresses plan adherence.
emotional_triggers: Historical trigger: post-dinner tension and urges ~6/10; current emphasis on maintaining an adherence rhythm (4.5) suggests concern about consistency under stress.
coaching_notes: Maintain a warm, encouraging tone; emphasize very small, repeatable actions; continue prompting logging of urge and mood; monitor for rising urges and be prepared to introduce additional micro-actions or adjust duration if needed to preserve engagement and progress.
